meanings.definition: An area of a country or city, especially one characterized by particular features or activities.
meanings.sent1: In our school district, there are many playgrounds for children to play.
meanings.sent2: The shopping district in our town is always busy with shoppers.
meanings.sent3: The district where all the cats gather to meow at night is quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room, making it the happiest district in the house.
meanings.sent5: The district filled with colorful flowers was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: A region marked off for administrative or other purposes.
meanings.sent1: The police district is responsible for keeping our neighborhood safe.
meanings.sent2: The financial district in the city is where all the big companies have their offices.
meanings.sent3: The district where only dogs are allowed to bark would be quite a sight.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a district of chaos, with thoughts running in all directions.
meanings.sent5: The district of books in the library seemed endless, filled with knowledge.
